lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam gets ever creative every week right before the camera goes live. Thank you, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First good one of the campaign, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, fantastic application for those to make their D&D characters and store them online and adjust. Sam, do you want to go ahead and take it away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! D&D Beyond is our awesome sponsor. It's a great online mobile access thing that you can manage all sorts of stuff. I'm losing my voice tonight, because--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know. So that I can preserve my voice for the rest of the night, Laura, can you read the copy and I'll lip sync it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The joy of sitting next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anyway, check them out at w-w-w-dot--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: DnD. Get $10 off any book in the marketplace with code 'beginnings.' Also, Sam Riegel is a cock bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! No! That's not what it says! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Well done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Classic, classic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Laura, for the assist. Thank you, D&D Beyond for being an awesome partners on this new campaign. As a reminder, Talks Machina, with our recently paroled friend Brian W. Foster, your host every Thursday-- I'm sorry, Tuesday-- Tuesday nights at 7:00pm on Twitch and Project Alpha to talk about this episode that's happening tonight, next week. Check it out if you're around and want to see different cast members' thoughts on what has transpired. The new campaign episode two is now available for download on podcast, so you can go ahead and find that where all great podcasts are available on the internet. Issue #4 of the Critical Role comic, Vox Machina: Origins is out! It's been out for a couple of days now. It's starting to ramp up towards the story climax in the next two issues. Pretty excited about it and the next two issues are crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well-oiled machine, that party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those of us that know what happens in the next two issues, it's like (quiet squeal) getting impatient.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god. I saw some early black and white pages today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you-- oh jeez. Why do we put you two next to each other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, I gave him a dice and he gave me a dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Saturday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show us your mouth holes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not want that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I expected your cheeks to be all poofy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have been throughout the whole week and steadily, I have been like, "Please, please, don't "be so bad on Thursday." It's okay. Not too bad today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look chiseled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He looks fine. It's all in his head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you dunk your head in a tub of ice and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to hide behind 50 characters now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. That's my usual defense mechanism for social engagement. Also, once again, our fantastic charity, 826LA. If you haven't had a chance, check it out. They do amazing programs for creative writing for underprivileged kids. If you have the opportunity to donate, or donate your time to become one of their fantastic volunteers, that would be fantastic. Check it out, we love them, and have been supporting them for a long time. They're amazing. Thank you, 826LA. Or an 826 near your home. I think those are all of the major announcements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that was fast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, we went through them fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even sort my dice yet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've gone around the town asking questions, meeting individuals, eventually finding yourselves back at the tent in the middle of the night, past midnight, in the early hours of the morning, sneaking into tents and asking members of the carnival what they may know about what has transpired. Upon speaking with a number of members of the carnival, two of the guards that were on site suddenly fell dead where they were standing, writhing in pain as they passed. You watched as a large shadow, which you had confirmed being fiendish in nature, leapt northward towards the Ustaloch and out of sight as both Fjord and Caleb rushed out of the main tent to see the center of the camp where these two bodies begin to rise up, two more of the freshly transformed undead creatures now angered and looking about for something to feast upon. And that was where we left off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totally good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem with our setup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Detect Good and Evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. So how many spells do you have left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No spells. I've got cantrips though, so don't worry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No burger left. Just onion rings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the fried piece. Not even an onion left in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you all to roll initiative, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right off the bat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fighting already?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope! I rolled her dice, it was a one, I'm never rolling it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We rolled low. Level two!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 20 to 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau at the top. 15 to 10?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Elf. 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that German?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight. That's a number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That it is. You?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have three initiative? What's your initiative?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your modifier?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good news is they didn't roll very high, either, but still better than a lot of you. And then three and three?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're one, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have five. One plus four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're one plus nothing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as these two zombified guards, their brass-colored scale armor clanking as their forms rise up, looking around, peer past the shadowed darkness around the campfire lighting the interior. The horses grow nervous as you watch both Caleb and Fjord emerge from the tent right in their sights. You watch as they both begin to lumber in your direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are out in the open?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're just sitting there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just walked out of the tent door and are looking at that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god there's that cart right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They come right up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are fast moving zombies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's all it can do. It dashed. It lurches towards them. They move a little bit quicker than you'd expect, but not necessarily that quick. They both spend their full turns trying to close the gap. For the horses--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There goes that idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was such a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The horses have better initiative than all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Jester and Molly. Fucking-- we probably shouldn't kill crownsguard, even if it's a zombie. Should we go after the toad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably kill the zombies because anybody that gets bitten by a zombie turns into another zombie!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to be a guard killer. All right, fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to be a fucking zombie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just can't be here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I peek out and see the guard-zombies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They did run by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch them as you peek under the tent and they both just ran to the right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I crawl out from under the tent and clear the gap with them and get up to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go into a dash if you wanted to engage directly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man, I don't know what to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. Work it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, this is my fault. I rolled for the zombies to see who they saw first, but technically their turn hadn't come up yet. That's my fault, because their initiative is lower in the order, so we're going to retcon a little bit of that. That's still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Rewind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's totally my bad. It's early enough in the combat where it's not going to make a huge difference. But you do watch as they turn and they look past the direction like they're ready to dart towards the actual large carnival tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I just want to do Hamilton with all our character voices.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After Jester trying to help me, can I close the gap to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can at this point, yeah. It's two squares to get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that mini!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're out there all by yourself! Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cool, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cut them down with those guns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that fire still going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a huge blaze, but there's some flames in it. It's starting to burn out a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both barrels. Six shooter. Give it to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. With my initial attack as I run up, can I take my staff and try and take them out at the knees? Just a sweep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. I'd say go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knock them prone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I'm going for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a natural 20 on his end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you swing with the staff, it slams into the side of the guard's leg and you hear the slight crack of wood as the armored exterior of the zombified form seems to stand resolute against the strength of your blow. Its head, which was turned off angrily towards the shadowed direction of Caleb and Fjord, turns back, the red burning coals for eyes now glaring in your direction. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at him and I say, you fucking broke my stick! I'm going to do an elbow to the face and then another punch with the staff still in my hand and do Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an unarmed attack for your next two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, I know. I'm doing an elbow and a punch, I'm just holding my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Misunderstood. Okay, go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, this makes me so nervous. That's good! 19 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and a natural one for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys with the ones at the start of this fight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what's happening!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage for the first one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't be too cocky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's new at the table?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. As you elbow across, wham! You watch as the jaw hangs and dislodges a bit, and as its head turns towards you, you reach with your other first and it catches it in the middle of the air and it tries to bite at your arm, but the jaw hangs open, not able to actually find any purchase in your arm. I believe that ends your turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to move over a bit towards that carriage and I pull the diamond out of my component pouch and a small prismatic ball forms over it. I take my other hand and spin it really fast and little ice shards start shooting out of the side. I take it with the free hand and I'm going to throw it like a fucking baseball pitcher at the one closest to Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Okay. So go ahead and roll your attack on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond, where did you go? Oh, that's good! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 definitely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So that is cold damage. 3d8. Come on! Nine total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of cold damage to it. You watch as it's trying to bite with no effect towards Beau's arm as she's pulling away. The sphere slams into the side of its shoulder, it would be this side, and it pulls back. You watch as the arm breaks a bit and the ice shards coalesce around the outside of the armor and linger with this frost and mist that sprays off the impact. It looks fairly damaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question, am I supposed to roll initiative for Frumpkin as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically by the rules, yes. But it might be easier to have you guys go at the same time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, if that's what you want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has 40 feet of movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough. Frumpkin is underneath there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's inside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's in the tent?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sneezing) Fucking cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, ja.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cute. Look at all the little barrels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burst out of the tent. Can I make it to the one that Beau is fighting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You can indeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make it to the one that Beau is fighting and I'm going to take two straight attacks with my scimitar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You see half of its body encased in ice now, and it's still lashing out in Beau's direction as you rush up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 15 and a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Without even figuring out, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fifteen plus whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those both hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20 is just double the die, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, iron snitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make up for our shortcomings, Taliesin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one's which?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First one is (counting) 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, double, I have to roll two dice, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first attack is that die, so that's not the critical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. That's nine points of damage. Then two dice or double the dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll just double the die, it's fine. It's fun to do it that way. Less dice to have to roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 13 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ha, nope. So you watch as it's slashing at Beau. The ice explodes in its side and Mollymauk comes walking out of the tent, both of the scimitars spinning in his hand like this dervish entity. As he slams both blades simultaneously into the sides of this creature, he cuts a v shape into the upper torso and it slips out of it. The central portion of its body slips onto the ground with a splat and the arms fall to the side and the body collapses onto the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I turn and smile at Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You cut like a little v cake with head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a pizza pie with a pizza slice. I turn 180 and get ready for the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't make me trust you any more. Less, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is now its turn. Having you rush out of the tent, its attention once in the distance, it traces you over as you attack its ally. It lunges over towards you and makes two strikes in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's going to be a blood vessel that pops on my neck and I'm going to make him cry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm just going to make him cry"!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bulging red eyes suddenly go black and thick droplets of blood-like ichor begin to spill out the corners of the zombie's eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take three damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh are you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm amplifying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take three damage. This attack and the next attack he has disadvantage on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh shit, that's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 and an eight for the first attack so that bring it down to a 12 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it rushes towards you, you can see the opening as it swings too wide and you duck right out of the way. Second attack with disadvantage as well. That's a 19 and a 16, so the 16 plus four that's 20, so it still hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It still hits. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get pushed back into Beau and Beau catches your fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not the jacket!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its go. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As fast as she can go, saying: Shit shit shit! Can she make it to that box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can't, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's (counting). You can get to right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As she's running, she's going to fire her crossbow at the dude. 11 plus six, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! Your dice just ollied off of the side of your dice tray! If this was Tony Hawk, you would be accumulating points still, it's racking it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've seen this Twilight episode. He knows what is behind your screen the rest of the game!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give him the multiplier!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is seven points of damage and sneak attack damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, as it is adjacent to Molly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another two points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! And why not? I'll use Fury of the Small! Add another two points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a full ten points of damage to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes and then bonus action can I just hide behind that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hide behind it because you'd have to get behind it, but you can use your bonus action to dash and get behind it. You're not technically hiding, but you'll move in this direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's what rouges can do, they can use their bonus action to dash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apparently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You get behind. "Oh god!" That finishes your turn, Nott. That brings us to Jester! You're up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh okay! I'm going to sit down on the ground and open the tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And look out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And look out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this sudden interaction of everyone, or at least Beau and Molly leaping towards the standing zombie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I say: Oh shit, I shouldn't have used all those spells earlier. All I have is Sacred Flame, and I'm going to do that. I'm going to shoot Sacred Flame and at the same time I'm going to go: Frumpkin, come here, let me pet you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so Sacred Flame is a saving throw for the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 13 dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually rolled exactly a 13 with no modifiers, so it does succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't do any damage then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what does it say on the spell, is it half damage or no damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just says that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then yeah, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls! (Coughs) Shit. Frumpkin! Lumpy, come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Jester's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, can I fucking run up past the cart? Charge into the fray with my 30 speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about as close as you can get right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pull out my falchion? I'll flip it over so it's pommel up and I will use Eldritch Blast towards the remaining zombie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hold your arm out in force, the edge of the pommel glows with this dark, black, purple, crackling energy, and this single bolt of Eldritch energy fires out in the direction. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis is using magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm telling you, it's all happening you guys! That is nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, nice. It hits and the armor dents inward, to the point where if it was still a living human, it probably would've caused some serious internal bleeding or bludgeoning, but the creature seems relatively unphased by the impact, other than being pushed onto one foot then back on its, two-foot weight. That ends your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way we're going to be able to take this shit seriously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, back to the top. I'm going to do with my two-handed, I'm going to use my quarterstaff two-handed and come down and try and crack it over his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you have to move over to him, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You vault off of the corpse of the other zombie guard and then leap down with your staff towards him, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it, fuck, balls and shit. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 still hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Fuck yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you weren't drinking a sea anemone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so weirded out about it. 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Wham! You slam into it and watch as it (impact). It's starting to look pretty beat up, but it's still standing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn, that armor's helping it, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action if you still want it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can hit again with my bonus, right? I'm still trying to figure this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every turn, as long as you're attacking with your action, you can bonus attack with you unarmed strike. Then use a ki point to double attack if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Learning these combat abilities, it's weird. Okay. I'm going to be like: Ugh, die! I'm going to do a big roundhouse kick to his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, that's a 16!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits! Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an unarmed strike? Okay, eight points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a two, plus-- No, wait! I'm sorry, six points. I was looking at the wrong thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Six points of damage. Whack! You slam it in the side of the head with a roundhouse kick and watch as the neck snaps and the head is stick there like (snarling). It's trying to snarl, but you can hear the windpipe is closed off at the angle that it got snapped and it's making this horrible choking sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, "Ugh, Molly!" "Do it!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay I'm also tapped as well. I'm going to back up against the tent that we came out of and with a sinking pit in my stomach, my hand starts to blacken and flake and fire springs from the palm and it shoots, and I cast Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a cantrip?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a cantrip, yeah. That's good though, that's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 1d10, that's this guy here that I never used in the last campaign. Oh, that's four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch its eyes lull for a second and it comes back with renewed undead strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Renewed

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Undead strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Renewed in the sense that for a second you watched the light flicker out but it seems to push through by the force of the enchantment that holds it aloft.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau goes: Who undid my work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I probably have a little bit of movement left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to sidle into the tent that I exited before and disappear. Frumpkin will dart across behind Molly to the little tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't leave me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Counting) What's the movement on Frumpkin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take two more shots, I'm going to see if I can decapitate--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more shots?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man! I've got to get out of that habit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two more swings?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two more swings, see if I can decapitate it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two more flourishes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But a 16 does not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the blade sinks into its shoulder and you see it carves in and jams halfway through the torso, the armor stopping it part way before it lodges in, and it leans forward. (growling) It's still standing, and your blade's stuck in the abdomen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Renewed, undead strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Molly. It's going to take its first slam, swipe at you. Since you're immediately in front of it. That's a natural 20. I'm rolling some good 20s tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What dice did you use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What other dice? Of course it's the snitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screaming) No, look what you did! Come back to bite you in the anus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is looking very bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It clocks you across the side of the temple. You're vision goes blurring for a second. You spit across the ground. You're used to the sight of your own blood, but now it's across the grass and dirt at your foot. You start to feel yourself get a bit woozy. It's going to go ahead and spin around and strike you with its open claw with the other arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I swear I thought I could kill it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 16 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'm out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah, first one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit! Christ!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Write the history books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as the first hit clocks Molly hard. The second one is this clawing uppercut. He goes backwards dropping one scimitar; the other one being left, stuck in the body of the undead guard. As it now glances back towards Beau to its right. That's the end of Molly's turn, and the zombie's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill it, Nott!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't fall into the fire, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he fell straight back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he rolled a one, we'd talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm immune to fire, anyways or some such thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire resistance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, fire resistance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of your magical, technicolor dreamcoat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what do you got? You just watched Molly go down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out, but not dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeing one of us die scares the shit out of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've just started working on a new character tonight. Thank god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start charging out at the beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire the crossbow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So brave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With sneak attack you double your dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm low to the ground so probably in the back of the calf or something. Before it falls, I'm going to turn and run into the tent. I don't even know if I hit. (screaming)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, as you watch it turn around towards you, suddenly it lurches as a crossbow bolt shatters its kneecap from behind. Its other leg, which had been partially damaged from the process of getting up and combat that's happened isn't enough to keep it aloft. It tumbles back into the fire and immediately begins to burn as it begins to scream and squeal. See the flames begin to burn and engulf its body before eventually it comes to rest, no longer held by this undead magic that keeps it standing. Quiet falls over the encampment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly. Well, next up, as this is now important, Jester it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come running out of the tent. Say: Molly! Oh shit, oh no! Okay. I kneel down next to him and I'll do Spare the Dying cantrip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a cantrip?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. It took someone going unconscious, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's designed for this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, you become stable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to make--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try and do some medicine on him? Does that heal him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a healer's kit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has desserts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have doughnuts, some paint supplies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau as you're standing here, Molly is no longer bleeding out. He's breathing and coughing in the unconsciousness from the pain. You watch as Jester is fiddling through her bag, pulling things out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a six pack of donuts, but you don't have a healer's kit in there? And you're the cleric? I'm confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, congratulations, you're the cleric now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You have a healer's kit? Oh my gosh. I've always wanted one of these for so long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Congratulations-on-you-being-in-a-new group gift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! How do I use this, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, she's not proficient.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open it and rummage through a bunch of shit here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No vanilla extract or sprinkles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the instance of this, since it's not necessarily immediate danger of him dying off. Go ahead and make a medicine check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use my dice that I gave you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I roll a one on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a strong four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll say-- (sighs). He's still unconscious. Given a little bit of time, he'll come back to consciousness. Ten minutes or so. You can probably, eventually through the use of strong vapors or something you can bring him back from the brink. At this point the rest of the carnival currently within the vicinity begin to emerge from the tents seeing that the danger has passed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any young girl in the tent with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You smelled it before, but it catches you very strongly now that there's quiet and you're not focused on anything else. A very faint smell of brimstone lingers within the tent, mingling with the wet grass. You look around and see no girl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does happen is Frumpkin scrabbles up your back and comes to your shoulder, and I'm watching everything from my hidey hole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately drop down and start searching the guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, is any of their armor still usable? Because we can pretend we're guards for some reason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that he cleaved, the armor is not functional at all. The other one, the last one to die, the armor is still functional. It is dented and beat up, but it's still functional. There's the slightly tarnished brass armor. Then there's the red maroon color. It's like a scale mail chestplate and armplates for it. It could be used but it's still a big piece of armor. You'd have to lug it around or wear it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still look like Crownsguard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both do, currently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb and I.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We probably have a half hour at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get out of here soon though because guards could be coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did anybody see what happened or where that hellish toad went?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It jumped off that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You saw it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Knot twins emerge like, "Where are the guards, the rest of them? Are more coming or is this all of them?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's probably more coming, I would think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you think we should run?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should hide the evidence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know who should run where.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have his head in my lap and I'm slapping his cheek consistently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was there nothing useful on the guard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you continue to search through, aside from the armor that seems functional, each of them have a basic longsword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of them has my sword embedded in their chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Which can be pulled out. Between the two of them you can gather about six gold pieces and four silver pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to get these folk in any more trouble. How far is it from here to the lake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing off to the side you can see the lake is maybe 400 to 500 feet north.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How well did the fire burn the other body? Did it do pretty well or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The robes or the maroon cloth is burned away entirely. The armor looks like its been burned. It has blackened, charcoal edges to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, you feel Frumpkin's claws slowly and deliberately squeeze into your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That means I have to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Caleb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought he was with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was. I look around for Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. If you're right there, you're not far from the tent. You head back and see he's not on the outside of the tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The smell of sulfur, I mean brimstone, do I figure that it's probably the residual from the big toad guy or is there a substance in the room that is causing it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You believe the little girl may have tooted before where she went to where she is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a devastating toot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try and get out of the tent through the side. Like underneath the side and towards the horse. Yeah, back there. Looking for Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and you don't see Caleb. You do see Fjord is in the process of looking in the area. You walk up and Caleb is nowhere near the tent on the outside. You don't know where he is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, have you seen Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not yet. Is he okay? Did he live? Did everyone live?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got his little cat right there on your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes I do, hi. Yeah, so he can't be far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to get out of here. We need to follow after that toad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. There's horses around here, let's steal them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually not a terrible idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the guards' bodies, too! That way we can drop them off away from the carnival and people won't think it's related.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you are so speaking my language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a very wise person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great idea. Let's do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to help me with the one totally charred body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do it. I go pick him up and carry him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The little, adorable tiefling, without an issue lifts the body out of the charred bits of burnt wood and charcoal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Never would have known.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab the other body and start dragging it or at least its torso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ornna gives a hand and helps you. The Knot sisters look like they want to be absolved of this whole scenario and look like they're about to flee at any moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might I point out real quick, up to this point we are fugitives who haven't committed a crime. But starting now we will be fugitives who have committed crimes. Are we sure we want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean it's either that or leave the carnival and take the fall for what is two dead crownsguard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go. But I have to find Caleb first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb gets over it and he comes out and starts helping push the bodies onto the-- doesn't say anything, but starts pushing bodies onto the back of the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd you go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is not my thing. I am not brave like Nott. Let's get out of here, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You shot shit out of your hands. I don't think you were not brave. That was really impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you were shooting shit out of your hands?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was fire. It's a figure of fucking speech.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't learned that one yet. Some day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody needs to grab Molly. He's still over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, okay. We go back over there and we fucking grab Molly. I grab him by his horns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're dragging Molly, Molly, your eyes lull open and you're at one hit point. Come to consciousness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at one hit point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're being dragged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start hooking up the horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're hooking them all up to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, one is going to hook up to the wagon and I'll-- which wagon do we want to take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll take that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unhook the other horse so we can steal that one, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are doing this, the two Knot sisters talking to each other, look around, and they go running to the southeast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're outies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I shoot them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that single horse a mustang?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Can I ask a simple question?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We better get $100,000 from Ford for that one. We better fucking get that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a mare? I'm just checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just very curious as to the sex of the horse, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a mustang.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is its name Roy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The white one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to name it Sally?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had that coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: During all the busywork, I'm not saying anything, but I keep giving worried and stressed glances at my little friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Caleb, I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have the bodies loaded up, both the charred and the slashed one, onto the cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull my sword back out and start trying to get the horses going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's alive! You're awake!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That really hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you feel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved your life. You should be really grateful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that. I can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly, I appreciate you trying to rally the horses right now, but I really think you should rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm fine. I'm going to actually fall back into the cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take the reins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Easy enough to find any sort of material if you wanted to cover the contents of the cart. You guys are ready to go. Ornna is standing there alone. "I think I should stay here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, and be a fugitive? I can explain what happened. Hopefully."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you going to say to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Exactly what happened. The same thing that turned these guards ran off and you're hoping to stop it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You couldn't see us in the low light, but they chased after whatever caused this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. I can do that. I can't leave Gustav and Bosun in prison to take the fall for this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll get them out of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you have the abilities to burn these things up the way we did? Are you capable? Could you have killed these things? Is that believable for people who know you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm quite good with fire. That's not entirely impossible."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ornna, is there anything else that you can think of that could possibly help us? Like why this toad decided to freak out right now? Anything that comes to mind before we go chase after your mess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any previous episodes of this kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is all I have left." She looks around the empty encampment. She stands amongst the four empty tents by herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toya's gone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toya's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to her? Did it take Toya with it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she frogged out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll try and find some evidence that will exonerate you and we'll return.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find evidence to exonerate us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Briefly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's okay. It's hard for some folks to trust carnival folk. Just as hard as it is for some folks to trust little green folk." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should really get to stepping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saddle up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hop on your mustang.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. Shelby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just deliver it to the PO Box, that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the cart and the horses at your disposal. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to take as much of a short rest as I can back there. I'm going to try and sleep this off like a bad hangover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will attempt to do the same to do arcane recovery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The two of you saddle up on the back of the cart as it makes its way northward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the direction the toad leapt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we really chasing the toad right now? Molly obviously did the most damage out of anyone and he's almost dead right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can at least find him, stake him out, and then we'll rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are going to rest, right? We can't just chase after a toad. We'll die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might need to play it by ear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, I'm trusting you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also I have a cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not what I mean. If we catch up to them, my cat can follow and I can watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you blanked out there for a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we find them, then we assign Frumpkin to the case and I will lean against a tree. Nott will keep watch over me and we will know where it goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going with them, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's follow the direction that the toad went.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cats love toads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The horses pick up and begin heading northward towards the Ustaloch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we get far away from the carnival, we should drop the guard bodies off. Push them out so it looks like they were on patrol when they turned into zombies. Far away from the carnival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We ran into those guards that were patrolling the lake--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly! Like a lake patrol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least the one you can see because there are multiple moons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two moons in Exandria.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did we never know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was established in the last campaign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like dogs, we never looked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the moons is so faint--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many suns are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one. Anyway, there's a faint bit of moonlight which gives you folks without darkvision a little bit of detail that you can make out in the vicinity. You come to the lake edge and there's the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the best we can do for them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take them out of this wagon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big dice, don't fail! Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your current visual perspective, you don't see the other end of the lake. It's a pretty decent sized lake, but you can see the very faint bump of a landmass that breaks the horizon of the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like an island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like an island, possibly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or a giant toad sitting in the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be a very big toad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's far away on the horizon, the little bump?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it breaks the water's horizon from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's two figures on a boat about a hundred yards out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they see us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. It's hard to say. Do they seem distracted? Can I make anything else out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lamplight on the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a faint bit of lantern light that's the only reason you're able to make them out at this distance, but that's as much detail as you can make out. They're a few hundred feet away from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we can't see them very clearly, they can't see us very clearly. We don't have a light on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to have to ditch this wagon anyway because we've got tracks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just change the license plate. No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vanity plate? What does it say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Back in time"? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go up a little further away from the boat and then dump the bodies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really shallow. Shouldn't we weigh them down with something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not like we're trying to hide the bodies. We're saying they turned into zombies around here. Is that stupid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they don't have to go in the water, right? They're burned. It's not like they burned in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be very confusing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wagon tracks directly to the point at which they are found.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I just said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, coming from the carnival.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wish I had something that could help Molly out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could write a little note and put it in one of their pockets that says something like "I've discovered that Caleb and Nott are innocent and should be cleared of all charges", or something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would definitely work. Will you add my name to that list?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. How do you spell Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like normal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can dump them, backtrack with the cart, and drop the cart back off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we've been riding, have we seen any tracks that we think might have belonged to the toad? Since it was leaping in these huge arcs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh, three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unable to pick up any tracks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we dump the bodies and I'll get out and try to make the tracks go away for a little bit. I'll walk up the path and do like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? We could get rid of the wagon later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but the wagon will come from the carnival straight to the bodies. Isn't that weird?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'd have to erase the tracks all the way back to the-- how far back are you willing to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not that far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the plan here? Are we going to flee?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we have to go back to the inn, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once the sun comes up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Everybody's in deep shit. I understand the problem, but my question is are we cutting and running?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I mean cutting and running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, we can't just leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We do it all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's see if we can find the toad. If the sun starts to break, then we'll make up our mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Are we dumping these bodies or what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, kick them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you remove the bodies from the cart. Are you dumping them on the shoreline?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (thud, thud) The two transformed guard corpses now lie there. One an ashy mess, the other in three pieces. Left along the bank of the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get out and I start positioning them like maybe they were having a romantic tryst.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those two burnt men? Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to help Jester try and clear the tracks while she positions bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (disgusted noise) Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody else want to look for some toad prints?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want us to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were going to go along the north way, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been doing that already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we try and cover the wagon tracks as much as we can, then follow the embankment and try and ride the horses and the cart along the water, it'll hide our tracks as we move northward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually a great idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really clever. Why would you even think that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she's all about shady shit. She does a lot of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. I don't know. I'll think about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singsong) Go to sleep, little tiefling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow, that hurts. Ow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, are the people on the boat doing anything different?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance back over and you can see the boat seems to have moved a little bit further away and has come up to the bank and looks like it's hitting land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, a little bit further away and then has hit the land. The figures are currently taking things out of the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're late night fishermen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they're fishermen. Let's keep moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, which direction are you moving?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: North.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, north is into the water. Like you hit the water of the bottom of the lake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The toad went due north? Like straight into the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the direction it was traveling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look for toad tracks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, don't roll Sam's fucking dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like something heavy impacted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord! Come look at this! This is definitely toad tracks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the shape that it's in, this print. Are their toes pointing in a specific direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this will break my short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will break your short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can vaguely tell they appear to be facing towards the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That lump is the toad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many people in the boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many people are we looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One and a giant toad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Didn't he leave with a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Girl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two people in the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do these silhouettes look proportionate to each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look proportionate to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does one look like Gorilla Grodd and---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look vaguely humanoid and regular.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which way did the fisherman go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are a little bit to the west along the bank in the direction of the city. The city is northwest of you currently. If you were to continue around the lake--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because the city is on the lake so we're just around the edge of the lake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should keep heading away from the city, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It depends on what we're going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're chasing the toad it seems like we need to find a boat and go out into the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we head towards that boat that hit land.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Steal that boat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we go towards the toad we are going to fight the toad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said this. We're camping and waiting and resting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The other thing we can do, but it will take some time, need about an hour. Frumpkin is a cat but Frumpkin does not need to be a cat. I could fly him over as well but I need time, I need about an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or swim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actively tracking this creature, aren't I on a certain level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you want to. You haven't yet decided to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hadn't really thought about it. It's something I can in theory do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you used your blood on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. This would also break my short rest, wouldn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I'd say for the points of expediency, with the time it has taken you and have these discussion at the edge, it's pushing 2:30 like 3:00 in the morning and both of you have finished the short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Hunter's Bane really quickly and look at the track for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get your blood maledict and you can use your hit dice if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to do both of those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I changed my mind, I believe I used arcane recovery during the day. So forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can hit dice it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet you have a thing where you can click it on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm at 12 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's better, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Better than one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay 12 hit points. I'm going to see if I can help with the tracking because I'm going to start actively tracking this particular creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Survival check? Which I have advantage on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on it because it's a feat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I have an hour to do some ritual casting, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the imprint you follow back the direction of the carnival and you can see the path because it was a beeline toward the Ustaloch. The best you can tell because the water picks up there's no trail to pick up in the water. Looking at the trajectory, it was very intently making its way towards the water either avoiding making any more tracks and making it difficult to follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guy went into the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we figured.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think he's trying to swim all the way to the other side or you think he's just going around the lake?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not lucky enough to have any small boats along the shores that have been beached?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not near you. There's the one that you saw the two fishermen are at right now. Then further into the city the docks, there's plenty of boats that are tied up and locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the level two-- Oh sorry, go ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a rules question, you go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if we find this thing, if we rest camping out then we're not at the tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got like four hours until sunrise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of us know what's beyond? Like what's on the other side of this lake? Is it a mountain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other side of the lake, from what you know, because you were traveling southward towards it, there's no major landmass on the other side of the lake. It's just open field. You notice what looks to be some sort of a bulge in the landmass in the center. Too large to be the toad, but it does seem to break up the water horizon from that vantage point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could have gone to the island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bet that's exactly where it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we feel about the knowledge that it's somewhere here in the lake, perhaps, or the other side? Circling back tomorrow? At least we'll avoid suspicion if we're at the inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you be able to keep tracking it? After you sleep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I'm not sure. Maybe. Could be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's to be able to see details of the specific type of tracks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can follow tracks. You can see blood splatters. Any sort of thing that can give you an idea of where something went that is of those types of creatures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I know what he was, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was a fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the knowledge of it being a fiend, go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I get advantage on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Religion check? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much as you can recall. But you're definitely sitting here now with this memory that comes to mind, going, "This whole time! This whole time--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This whole time I've been sitting with this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rules question. Caleb is too fucking poor to change Frumpkin's shape willy-nilly because it's ten gold pieces worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs, which I don't have. So he's a cat for the foreseeable future.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you just need ten gold pieces?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need incense, herbs, and charcoal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you saying this out loud?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm just talking in my accent to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got some incense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have charcoal?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure we can find some charcoal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't this impressive enough that I happen to have some incense?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we can get back into town somehow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go shopping at three in the morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, elements of that guard's body are charcoal now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go back and raid the fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There'd also be a fire inside the inn, to be fair. Charcoal is-- it's not like it's hard to get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you two seem to be able to move freely, without suspicion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true, you can go shopping more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go maintain the illusion of innocence for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we walk the cart off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe give the horse a little spank on the ass and send it on its way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See where it goes. I like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's open 24 hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That random book about fiends has all the answers about the fiend we're chasing. Let's go get it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You should do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I'm remembering something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We head back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go along the lake, then off to the edge, and then we're going to give the horse a slap and send him off past--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two fishermen you see are in the process of tying up nets and bags of things, and they just stop and watch you guys ride by, then go about the rest of their work. You continue with the cart, pulling it up toward the southern edge of where the Ustaloch meets Trostenwald, and you can abandon it there, or you said you wanted to send it somewhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we would have taken the cart past the fishermen. Are we going to do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought we were going to head back to the village, to a good distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much ground did we cover, I don't know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're taking the cart back to a distance from the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half a mile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and then letting the horses run, so the-- sending the track off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I see. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we would have gone right past the fishermen that would be able to identify us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Using the lake to hide tracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys head the opposite direction for a little ways after the field. All right. Who's spooking the horses?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's your specialty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whack with the stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please roll bad. If there is any justice in the world...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not great. Thanks, Travis. Thanks. Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six? To hit a horse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correctly hit a horse!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The horse whimpers; you hurt a horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? As soon as you hit it, there's a (whinny) and there's a split-second where you watch its back leg muscle twitch, and you duck out of the way just as its back hooves (whoosh) past your face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to the horses and-- they're trained horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go whisper in their ear and give them a little pat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You rolled shit, too!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horses are our new door!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drops a couple of horse apples.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't get advantage on that because I knew the animals, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You knew the animals, but you weren't the animal handler.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy and I make the sound of like a predator behind them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll give you an animal handling check with advantage, because it's fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm into this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 13!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13! It's above a ten, guys! Awesome!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (chanting) Level two!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is Romper Room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I know! With a crack, and a heavy echoing snarling sound in the vicinity, both horses kick up and go into a full gallop sprint away from the direction of you, the cart being dragged behind it. They continue to go into the shadow. You don't know how long they're going to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Thaumaturgy! (quacks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the time you guys make it back to the inn--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those ducks are scary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys being careful, or are you just walking back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're being careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd like you all to roll a stealth check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use Mask of Many Faces to make myself look old.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that? I don't even know what that was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at all that stuff!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- Does anybody have shitty stealth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't even see myself with this roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, but I rolled 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well okay, I was going to give anybody advantage, but here you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that was bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have advantage, right? Roll again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I already rolled once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18, but I'm also--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, my stealth would be 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's fine. You manage to make it to the Nestled Nook Inn without any prying eyes seeing too deeply into your movement. You get back to your rooms as the very faint distant change of black night begins to turn to the faintest of blue of morning curling over. You guys go to your respective rooms, and you take a rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to dig some charcoal out of the remains of the fire in the common room and then go to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The owner watches you do that and she's just, "Whatever."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't thank me. Lovely inn. Good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't get anything else dirty!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just going to draw some dicks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys complete a long rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One day down. Two days down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we reset our max hit points when we take a long rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your max hit points? I mean, your max hit points are your max hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you hit 'long rest', it should auto-reset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With D&D Beyond, it does the work for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, is there a rest button?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is, there are two rest buttons, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are they?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're down towards the bottom, short rest or long rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fell asleep in my sketchbook, halfway through my drawing of the two zombie guards making out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gross. Were they dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're zombies, so yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slightly hotter, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One arm is like off to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way hotter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With full rests completed, consciousness comes to on the outside of Jester's room with the heavy sound of (knocking).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that our door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, I'm naked!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, hold on, she's naked! Do you want to get it? Or should I get it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll get it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe I should get it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I get up, I get it. Hello!

lines.name: MATT
