lines.text: You open the door. The same two crownsguard that had come the day before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you come back to play some games?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. We came to tell you that you'll be needed for the investigation and questioning "within the next three hours to arrive at the behest of the Lawmaster at the stockade."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't you just come and get us when you were ready for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know, we might want to brush our teeth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that take you three hours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Now we have time to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll be back in three hours."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll see you soon! I miss you already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rested. At this point in time, it's past noon. It's about two in the afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No knock on our door, only you two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no. It's these two currently, for the moment. Then-- (knocking).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your jury summons is (groans).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just finishing up with them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's two o'clock in the afternoon, you said? When we woke up?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got back in the middle of the night. No real job here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll open the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two guards are there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry to disturb, the investigation will require you in about three hours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just shut the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Love it! It's my favorite. I was waiting for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go down for breakfast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go down. It's Yorda who runs the place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I find Yorda. Excuse me, a question about the town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's right in the middle of pouring a drink, she's like, "Right! What do you need?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a pawn shop anywhere in this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're looking for strange wares in general, then your best look would be Burnished Bibelots."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You might be able to talk to, let's see here-- Lochward General might be interested in "buying a few things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wockwurt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lochward General.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's in the Lochward, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aye, it's about three blocks up north.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only been here two days. Okay, you are down here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm always with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. That flask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes? You saw that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I did see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not sorry at all, but I have a big favor to ask you. That's very valuable what you have there. Do you know that is made of platinum?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I know that it's made of platinum, just from glancing at it and feeling it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks very pretty. Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. Just an intelligence check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, just your modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very shiny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me explain it to you. That little bottle is worth a great deal. It can buy you many full bottles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to get rid of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to trade that for many bottles of booze? Many.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a tough decision. But this is the only one I have! I only have one flask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've gotten a little booze, but we can get a lot and those books are expensive and I know that we can get enough money for it and I really don't feel like pushing our luck with the law here in town and pulling a fast one again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, but it's so pretty. How about this for a counteroffer: how much are the books?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were worth a total of 13 gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did she just hand me 13 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take her by the head and I rustle our heads together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good deal. I leave to find that place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I come with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're coming too? What a good day this is! All right, let's go shopping!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys make your way to Burnished Bibelots. It is open, though there is nobody currently inside the interior. As you go to the door, it opens up and you see the same cluttered mess of the inside. There across the way you see the tiny gnome gentleman who's up on top of his desk, his legs folded over each other. He's looking through a book right now, as he's thumbing through, "Hello!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello there, my friend! Just as I said, I've returned. I have what we agreed on. 13 gold for these two books that we discussed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes! Okay. Good! I have them held right here!" He reaches back and then has to arrange himself again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And dies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Free books!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The best day ever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually he crawls off the top of the desk, gets down there, puts the two books on the top. "Wonderful doing business with you!" Slides them forward to you, counts--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are the same two books? As yesterday?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are the ones you told me to hold for you, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I was asking Matthew, these are the same two books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes they are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh good! Excellent!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your accent is confusing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it's confusing when you speak with the accent all the time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never stopped with the British either last time, so I'm never going to stop. Oh, I'm so happy, and I'm saying this out loud as Caleb. Good day to you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure you don't want to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scoop up Nott and I just start dancing down the street with her up onto my shoulders!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure you don't want stay here and shop around some more? Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! We have plans to make with our new friends! Let's go get some breakfast!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but I could've perused some of the aisles and it's a long-- okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope! We're away!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No hands in your pockets order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back as the rest of you have come to consciousness and you head down to the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Why are you guys so happy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good shopping run. Where did you get 13 gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've always had it, you never asked for any.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good to know. I don't need to know anything more, I'm just happy that you have it. I'm thankful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I collect things. Among them are pieces of gold. I have more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just squeeze the cheeks, and I look at my books!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! You made my cheeks all green!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'll take you a few hours to go through those books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I will start on the one about fiends because it is topical!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to read through it. In the tavern at the table, or do you want to read in your room? Up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No I'm going to read here. Good focus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look at one of your books?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a yes? You said yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shove the book deep into my belt near my dick so she doesn't want to go near it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not afraid of dicks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not your sister anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good point. Hey now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He gets like this when he's studying. He gets very focused, it's best not to disturb him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an interesting book. It talks about different forms of fiends and demons and the hierarchy of the Nine Hells. It talks about myths and stories of devils and demons interfering with the lives of mortals. A lot of it is fables, a lot of it is warnings and things that parents would tell to keep their children from wandering in the darkness. But it does have little tidbits of information about different types, and they talk about horned devils, and they talk about the great and terrible balor and pit fiend, and it seems to be a jumble between both demons and devils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look over his shoulder the whole time he's reading it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, if he lets you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not let her. I am in a corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's about 2:30 to 3:00?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's about three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the next couple hours they said they would call for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go look for the toad?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to say, did they come to your room as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. In a couple hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we talk about what we're going to say to them? Do we need to corroborate our stories?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we tell the truth, we did nothing wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, we were in this inn the whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was thinking that if we get out of there tonight, fingers crossed, we should probably think about acquiring some sort of vessel to explore the lake tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can definitely steal a boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know where a good fisherman's boat is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or I may be able to arrange free passage on a vessel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, how?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a little knack with, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was a sailor! That's how I met him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, for a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, that's pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long was that for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Few years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as Caleb looks up, I look in his book. What is your book about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this is about grumpkins and periwinkles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Those are my favorite!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is a periwinkle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there drawings of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Occasional drawings. There's no penises drawn in this book so I don't think you'd be interested.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any toad creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find one interesting tidbit of information that piques your interest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, he has it written down? On a thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, the first piece of paper of the game!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he decides he wants to share, it's up to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave me alone, I'm reading.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, we're bored! Tell us a story!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need 20 actual seconds to see what the piece of paper says!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you read it now? What's it say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Fjord, you're very acquainted with seamen then? Having been on the water for so long?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure am! Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you heard that joke a lot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have. It gets funnier every time, though, I got to say. It's all in the delivery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He laughed at it the first 20 times I said it to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, do you seamen have cloisters in Trostenwald?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there clusters of seamen around you at all times?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it too early in the campaign to walk away? And I fucking saunter away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Fjord slowly walks away from the table, not engaging with your comedic advances.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I remember people talking about nightmares from the past couple of days? Not Liam, but Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you didn't inquire or question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I didn't overhear, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it's chock-a-block with a lot of things, most of it probably untrue and stories to scare your children, but there is some sort of demon that is described as being fat and rotund, and it talks about-- I mean, this is too coincidental, it can't be the thing that we're-- what are the odds of something being in this book, and it's what we're chasing today? But this is describing some sort of scaled demon that feeds on people in the night, when they're sleeping, and it leaves corrupted, undead corpses behind, known as husks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is what they look like. They look like husks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They did look like husks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we didn't see anybody it fed on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does this book-- is it of this town, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it's a general book about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: General book, could be anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anywhere, anything, it doesn't even mention locations. It's just, "This is some lore about "devils and demons!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kylre's been around for a while, though! And this is new, right? I feel like-- Was there nothing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How well did you know Kylre?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, not that well. Of everybody, the least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You haven't heard the word nergaliid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he says that, it triggers something in your brain, and that thought you had the other night clicks. Like, that's what it was that was escaping you. Nergaliid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have heard that word before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because that's what I'm talking about here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear. Oh, why can't I remember? It was so long ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so what was Mr. Frogman's diet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what did he feast on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did he eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He ate what was given to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He ate what we had!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was no draw to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You never noticed him eating people before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't necessarily know I would've commented on it, but I would've noted it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it was not noted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once again, I have no idea if this is the creature that we're in pursuit of, but this talks about it not eating food, but siphoning the life off of mortal creatures, but not to the point of death or harming them. They might not even notice that it's happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe all of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says that this thing has two types of feeding: one is slow and unnoticeable, maybe, and one is quick with much pain and anguish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say anything about it hiding in water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say anything about it liking the sound of song?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it related at all to the periwinkles you were talking about before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not possible he's trying to head back to Xhorhas, is it? I said out loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we saw both the fast and the slow feeding methods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kylre was not a talker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say how to kill it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, weaknesses? Vulnerabilities?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stabbing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, most fiends are weak to holy damage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I also do this? I'm thinking about everything I hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll let you roll for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have a vulnerability to poppyseed muffins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's sort of storytelling and an informative thing, but it's not a catalog about all the aspects and details of each creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, it's a kid's Encyclopedia Britannica, and scanning through, I saw one thing that popped out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you were like, wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I ask with my intelligence score of 18 and the Keen Mind feat, could we say that Caleb is a speed reader?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In comparison to some, maybe. You're not Johnny Five-style, I know kung-fu.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Believably, not magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend a lot of time by yourself reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Reading."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the bathroom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clusters of semen all around you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can paint it across the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always funny. Always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about masturbation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you say that Caleb is a speed-beater?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for spanking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this discussion, the two guards that had come in earlier come through the main door earlier than the three hours you had anticipated with another guard in tow. As they rush in they glance around the room and see you and make a beeline to your table in a very huffed bit of energy. They say, "You are absolved of meeting this afternoon. We'll pick this up "tomorrow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This will be part of the investigation tomorrow, you are not to leave this inn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we could help. Obviously, we had nothing to do with it if people are hurt outside and we were here the whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are we absolved yet we still have to be locked in this inn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've arrested Ornna and we have members of the carnival that have fled that we're currently "seeking at the moment."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should pick better words next time that are slightly more clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll return tomorrow." They leave in a frustrated huff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, our day just got freed up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they still said we couldn't leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could read that other book, at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could. I could also-- here's the thing about my cat. He's a cat, definitely a cat, but is also a fey creature. If I have an hour, he doesn't have to be a cat. He can temporarily be a bird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much did you say it costs, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I have a lot of charcoal now, and you said you have incense on you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go into my bag and I've got some old, weird-- I've got a weird little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got about eight silvers worth of incense, and that's a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in a very strange, ornate bag that's covered in strange gems and weird filigree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Molly always smell of patchouli?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sandalwood. It's nag champa all over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's masking the faint scent of horse dung.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else do you need?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let it all out. Go for it. Don't hold back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure you want to do this, with your cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I prefer him as a cat, to be honest, but in a pinch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else besides a bird? I mean, any kind of creature?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not any kind of creature, but I've made him an octopus once. There was this one time when Nott was very high up in a burning building and we had no way to get her down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I jumped on to the octopus and it served as some sort of a landing pad. It killed the octopus, but I lived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Octopuses are very smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's octopi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't say I was very smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Enough about the pastries already.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can be killed is an important thing to know. I only mean, if it's important to you, in a moment of danger I would try to save it, but if that's not important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can be pricey to keep bringing him back and all that, but he-- no, you can't kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. That's very impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've tried.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's eaten him twice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was very hungry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will need about an hour of time; I'll probably head upstairs. Do you have a pot I could borrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yorda is currently in the process of sitting down and checking something underneath the bar and goes, "I'm sorry, what was that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll borrow this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this enough to jury-rig?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much is the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's ten gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're going to need to go out and buy some.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I asked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Buy some, what, incense?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this is a joke. I need to actually go to the incense store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get ten gold worth of incense?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For this plan to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the remedy store that you've seen before, and that would be the place to have incense and/or herbal type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been to one of these places, it's called Natural Remedies. Herbs and medicinal things. It's up the street a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have ten gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have ten gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going through gold very quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I could sneak in and grab it for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could help you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're still in trouble with the law. I don't want to push that. If we have the gold, that's the safest path.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in for a penny. I'm going to throw a gold in there as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you have ten gold between you: nine from Fjord, and one from Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll put one in, then you have only eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so eight off. All right, you have the gold. We'll say for the purposes of expediency, it's easy enough to go and purchase the necessary incense and it's quite a bit. For the purposes of this ritual, which you've done before, it's quite a cluster you have to assemble for this. The chalk's amassed, the other materials you need for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dear--!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brain wipe. I'm going to go up to my room and it takes me an hour to do this. An hour and ten minutes to be exact. I put the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at the dungeon master. Is that maybe the longest facepalm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, you guys have made me facepalm pretty long before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go upstairs to cast "Find Familiar".

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you found him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What form?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A sparrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish the concentration, the cat form shimmers and condenses into this tiny little cluster of coal before it sprouts wings and you glance on your shoulder. (whistles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I know this is not your preferred form, but it is only temporary until I get ten more gold. Let's go down and get some breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, after waiting patiently and talking amongst yourselves, Caleb reemerges with a tiny sparrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There he is. He lands on Molly's horn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On his horn, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the lumpiest little bird I've ever seen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is his name still Frumpkin, it's just a bird now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always Frumpkin, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's a little feathery Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He flits over to Jester's horn. Takes a dump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel so special and blessed, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You look like a princess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He stays there for the time being. Is this what we're doing? I can't go anywhere, I'm going to be blind and deaf, I have to stay still and safe. Try not hit me in the head with too many things. It'll take a while, but he will go off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if you'd like, you could stay at the inn, or we could acquire that boat and once you're on board we could send it out as a sort of a recon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do sparrows see in the dark? They're daytime birds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is daytime right now, it would require us leaving now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do this quickly before the light goes away, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if we can send the sparrow out, we can carry him with us if he finds anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could have done a bat, but it's too late for that now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A bat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out the windows as we did before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's let the sparrow see if it can find anything. Then we know which direction we have to head into so there's not too much meandering about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we hunker down here while--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until there's a direction to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps we should go upstairs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only see through Frumpkin's eyes for up to a 100-foot radius.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we talked about this. You told me-- and if you need to change it, change it-- But that I can only control him telepathically up to 100 feet, but could continue to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm happy whatever your ruling is, but that's how we've done it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to recall the specifics, I may have confused--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If that's the case, we'll get the boat. If not, we'll let drone sparrow activate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I based this whole plan on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have to get in disguise again in order to leave?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could try to go out the side of the windows. It is daytime.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wording was a little squirrely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wording is a little squirrely. Yeah, you cannot communicate with it telepathically, but you could technically still see through its eyes, I suppose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can give him the command up close to go, but if anything happens I can't improvise with him. He does what the command is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. What's the command?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To fly north to the island and circle it a few times to see what we can see and come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you go up to the window and release Frumpkin--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we say we're doing this from one of our rooms?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We gather in Fjord and Molly's room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's curious, when Caleb is focusing, the pupils go to a very faint sky blue. You see flickering in them, though you cannot make any imagery out of it, it's just the strange movement within the pupil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, there's that bullshit again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't communicate with us when he's like this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He talks. He will talk to you out of the fucking blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he feel if we touch him? I poke him in the forehead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't do that, please, I'm trying to concentrate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he tell who did it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he can't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I will tell him later when he asks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay, but he won't know now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically not north from where you are now, since you're back in the city, it's more of a northeastern direction. They're both relatively small, one's maybe a few hundred feet across, another one is maybe 50 feet across. It's a smaller mass. Watching as it coasts downward and does a pass over the larger one, make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a six plus very little or nothing, so you can guesstimate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The island has a few small trees, which is mainly what you had seen during the night when you looked out over the water, Beauregard. The land mass was actually the very top of this tree line. It's a small grove that has clustered there on the center of this island. Unable to make out any other details other than the tops of these trees and there's a few spots in between where you can see overgrown grass and general ground, rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the bigger one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bigger one, yeah. Make a perception check for the smaller one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worse. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one has maybe five or six trees on it, but most of them appear to have either died or be standing alone on this small mass. That one looks pretty barren. Even with as bad of a look as that was, it doesn't look like there's anything visible on that land mass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look balder than the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The larger one has much more of a cluster, a grove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last question, I can probably tell how far apart these two islands are, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're roughly 600 feet apart from each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 600, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all sitting around in this room, watching him watch TV, essentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While this is going on, can I whip out my little chemistry kit and start putting together some chemical stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, what would you like to make?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It requires half a day to make that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start it, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get in an hour of work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she's doing that, I'm going to take my staff and repair where it cracked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's easy enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to braid Caleb's hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it feels good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We talking just one braid? French braid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a few little braids, because his hair is not super long. Maybe one here, one here, and one down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't make me Vax again, it won't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check, adding your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You kill us all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Play-Doh, we've got Play-Doh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the supplies that you've spent-- You've used your one set of acid supplies you had on you, so you'll have to buy more to make it again. As you begin to make it, it becomes caustic and begins to melt through part of your glove. You immediately freak out, you drop it, and it hits the wood. Splatters a bit and begins to melt through the wood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. I didn't mean to, I was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Now we can spy on the people below us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It didn't go through the entire floor, I don't think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're not going to get our deposit back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll move the nightstand over a little to cover it up. No one will see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it slowly eating through the wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is still slowly eating through the wood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pour some water on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That makes it worse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually Frumpkin begins to return, having done Frumpkin's full watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I see that he's halfway back, I come out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come out of it and the first thing you see is all of them gathered around this hole in the wood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I plant my hands on the sides of the wood and start transmuting it to iron.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Iron? That's not noticeable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you concentrate, the area and the wood around where that hole is all of a sudden begins to turn darker and more solid. While the texture remains of wood, suddenly it has the appearance of a dull reddish-brown metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. We'll mop it up with some towels and whatnot while it's still iron.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully it will dry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a hell of a talent you have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's pretty fancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what you did with the coin? Is this the coin trick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the coin was magic. It was a magic pot that we sold you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I've been concentrating on skinky-doodles all day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is your power word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it brought us closer together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like back the two copper pieces you gave me for the pot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you keep it. I'm a very generous person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we ask what you saw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course, sorry. Acid. Wood. There are two islands out there, a bigger one-- they're not close-- and a smaller one. One is bald-ish, a couple of trees, but I couldn't see too well on either of them. The bigger one is dense with trees. I didn't see them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have it fly down closer so you could see better?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that he would be able to see from the air, and I thought that would be safer, so no, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it busy water, was there lots of ships out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have seen that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some fishing vessels out there, and there are a number of them that are still at the docks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a lull for any reason?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not fleet week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we should go to the big island?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that the chances of finding it on the big island are greater, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Out the window, shall we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By now it's 3:30 in the afternoon, four o'clock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we wait until dusky-time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking. Wait until the sun starts to go down? Because it's got to be soon at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it's probably closer to five at the time that you've spent with Frumpkin, so it's starting to get closer to dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Does anybody else want braids in the amount of time we have to wait?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah! Can you give me one going back this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, I can totally do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anyone else going to be heading out the front door besides Caleb, Nott, and myself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to waste a spell this time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll keep with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away, roughly, was the edge of the lake and islands from where we are right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are right now? I'd say a mile and a half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so while everyone is preparing, I take out my spool of silver thread and I go first to Jester's room, and I stretch the thread across, and a little (magic flitter sound) flashes across and the thread disappears. It takes about ten minutes each time, and I do the same on Fjord's doorway, stretch across (magic flitter sound). If anyone goes in to these doors besides you, I will know, but not when we're on that island. Only on the way there. Lasts about a mile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While we're getting ready, Molly, I don't know if you unintentionally dodged the question last time, or if you didn't hear me, but you never exactly told us how the circus creates and writes their performance acts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd forgotten about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so you did hear me though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were in the middle of things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just clarifying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's usually Gustav. If somebody's got an act, they show it off, Gustav figures out how it's going to work into the narrative. Puts it all together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You bring your own narrative?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly. Mostly an act.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did Toya and Kylre come together with their act?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They came separate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They came separate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you're thinking of Toya and Kylre? They were an act before-- They were an act for as long as I can remember, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As long as you can remember, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've never not known them as an act.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought when we talked to them they said that Toya came after Kylre. They joined the circus at separate times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what they told you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we were investigating, we were--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We gave them a hard-- what was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bad Cop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Good Cop. I was the good cop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was the bad cop!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and we got hard information from them!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not leaving here without telling us the truth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I was like, "Don't worry, she won't hurt you!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm crazy! I'll bite her too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then they fessed up to everything! They were like, "We're a fiend!" and she was like, "I'm a little girl!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it was crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was how it went.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She confessed to being a little girl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any empty positions at the circus for these two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling like maybe that might be a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tealeaf, you said, "It's mostly an act." What's the not-mostly part?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're weird people. People come in and you're a bit strange, you got something you can do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they all swashbuckling swordsmen like you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they all tell fortunes like you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they cut themselves like you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's a complicated conversation, but no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are super easy to lie to, no offense or anything. They lied to them, which means--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they didn't lie to us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We meted out the truth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They told us the truth!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We cracked the case wide open!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is a little girl, to be fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toya. Unless, and here's my new theory: the big frog man can leech the life force from people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If that's what it is, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if Toya is a fully-grown adult woman, but he's been slowly leeching so much life from her that she's a small husk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Toya's not a fully-grown adult woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a tiny full-grown person!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's a dwarf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, she's just a dwarf? Oh, okay, that makes more sense, actually, when you say it that way. It seemed like she was shrunken down from magic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is so offensive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps this girl Toya is his baby's bottle, and then once in a while he wants an extra snack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you're right, but I don't know how he's managed to go this long. Why now, and why in front of all those people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he's like one of those creatures that lives on the bottom of the sea, and she's not actually even a person, she's like this light thing that dangles in front of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of his tentacles!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has tentacles now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not just tentacles, dwarf tentacles!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. I think we know all we need to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he is a fiend. I think he is feeding off her. The rest of it I'm not sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You never noticed Toya acting weird? You were never like, "Oh, this is a strange--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you met us? We're all a bit weird, and you don't ask a ton of questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but there's a difference between "quirky" weird and "Oh, I think this person's life "force is being siphoned away from them" weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is. It's the difference between being in a carnival and not being in a carnival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then why were you with the carnival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I'm weird!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That tracks. That fully tracks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it's putting together. He was never that talkative. I don't know. I don't like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go find the damn toad!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use Mask of Many Faces to change into that older gray-haired farmer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Easy enough. The sun is close to setting. you've got about another 30 minutes or so before it sets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bless you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gesundheit. On the way out, can I grab some booze from the bar to fill up my platinum flask? Or to fill it up a little?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say for that, that'll run you about-- Fine liquor? About two silver pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I'll mark it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a hefty flask, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark that bar tally. All right. Liquor refilled, you go towards the window, you all gather and glance out, and in the alley below the inn is a stationed crownsguard that wasn't there before. You immediately get the sense that with the sudden murder of two crownsguard being discovered in the vicinity, they may have beefed up security a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only one of them is guarding the alley's exit onto the main street, and they're looking away at the moment out into the road, but occasionally glance over their shoulder into the alley. But there appears to be a little more of a security set-up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should go out the front and talk to him and distract him so we can sneak out the window.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can do that. Do you want to come along on this little escapade?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm a good talker when I have to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As am I.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep lookout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not the right kind of talker for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. So I'll head out the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you exit without issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I locate the crownsguard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough, and as you exit the tavern, you can see where once there were two guards sitting at the front, there's now three, and there are two guards stationed across the street that are keeping a watch. It looks like everyone's on high alert since they've had some of their own crownsguard killed. You make your way around the corner, through the T-intersection to the other road that meets with the main street that crosses in front of the Nestled Nook, and you see the guard stationed outside who's currently leaning up against the wall, arms crossed, looking back and forth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run up to him and say: (old raspy voice) You, please, over here! I've seen one of those creatures! It's tearing into him and it's horrible. Please, come quickly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, here it is. Come on, charis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? He goes, "Which way? Please, point and show me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This way, quickly, please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so scared of rolling right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why does every roll have to be-- Oh thank god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, why.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine, we went out the front door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, it's a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a nordic "7."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going out the front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know! You know, if it's binary, one means--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Between the three of you making the check that's still a majority success. But you do pop your ankle when you land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see the stink-eye he gave me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't make comments after he just was kind to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was being kind! You sprained your ankle a little bit as you land and you kind of hop behind but the three of you make your way past the alley without issue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have disadvantage on all checks for the next two days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how I would rule it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why we don't have you as DM.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This ankle is affecting my wisdom! It's reaching into my family's history!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dungeons & Dragons is about punishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of you dart on the outside and make your way down the alley behind what looks to be a cluster of empty rain barrels that are set up to catch during storms, and you appear to have managed to just avoid the sight of the guarding crownsguard on the outside of the inn. Caleb and Nott, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're scouting the way nonchalantly, I would imagine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm real! I'm with you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they darted off into the alley, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could make our way to the outskirts of town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I said that I would be on lookout duty, so I'm just peering-- Wait they went to the alley to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While he was distracting them, you saw the guard leave with Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go with, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we can stay in the open. I send Frumpkin up into the air over the party, 100 feet in the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going out in the open to the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can also follow the bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say, why don't you guys lead the way, and you guys give us a signal if you guys see a guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aren't there. You haven't caught up with them yet, they're still out in the open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I miss the earrings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I take your hand, and I'm watching them from above.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm guiding him along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the two of you make your way towards the docks slowly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm totally acting like I see everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. I see everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have my hood up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm over cloak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Weekend at Bernie's walking. Looking around at nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guide for two and a half blocks and the guard's still like, "Where is it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look over my shoulder and keep running, and then go: Oh, what do you want? Who are you? Why are you following me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You called me-- You said there was one of them--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have I done something again? Have you seen my son? What's your name? You're a strong looking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sheathes the blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh dear. Do you have any coin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks up and slaps you across the top of the head, and just goes, "Don't go wasting our time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry. No respect for the elderly, apparently. I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He spits on the ground towards you and turns around and heads back to his post.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunting) I make my way towards the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all manage to slowly make your way to the outskirts of the Ustaloch, down to where the majority of the docks are set up on the lake itself. Since the lights have gone out, most of the boats have now come back in, and they are bringing in their hauls out, and have small nets and baskets filled with fish they've caught while they're out there, small crustaceans, most of them are in the process of just offloading and locking up and tying their boats. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think perhaps the best thing to do is to rent a boat, not steal a boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should talk to people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we may be able to avoid any kind of trading of currency.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your idea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me see if I can find a boat that would accommodate all of us and see if we can find some amicable people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a sailor, apparently I'm able to acquire free passage on ships.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to talk the talk and maybe trade something, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a heavy knitted cap that's folded back onto the top of his shoulders and a long coat, and as he's standing there, he looks over at you and watches you approach, taking the rope and tying it around the edge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello there. I was hoping that perhaps I could trouble you. We're trying to make our way out into the lake, some of my companions and I, for a small day trip. We've never quite been out on the lake, not this one. Is there a chance we could trade some work on your day's journey for some travel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're looking for someone to take you around the lake, I could do that for a bit of coin, sure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, we're a bit light on coin. Is there perhaps anything we could help you with around here in trade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances at your hands as you're talking, "You look like a hard-worker."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Many years of my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you from?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Port Damali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I see you've been a shiphand before. I can see the cracks in the fingers."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They never go away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at his own hand. "So you're just looking for a joyride?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it would help me look a bit more impressive in the eyes of my younger comrades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a bottle to take more out there, we'll call it even."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Much obliged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." He goes and starts getting the boat ready to go back out on the lake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go back. It fucking worked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty cool, Gramps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks. We should go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's getting ready. The trade was to bring a bottle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bottle! Right. You don't happen to carry any fine firewhiskey on you, do you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I gave you some money, could you go pick us up a nice bottle of some stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't trust you. If I gave you some money, could you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you can definitely trust me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't trust you either. Beau, I'm going to give you three gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's too much, but do I get to keep the change?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it. I'll be right back. I go get two bottles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is some Two-Buck Chuck style of wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't come back with ten gold wine if I said I was broke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two-Gold Bold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the gold and you get a bottle of cheap wine, make your way back to the boat--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I pull Fjord aside while she's off doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, that voice you're doing. It almost sounded like you actually did in Port Damali.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I like that voice. I like this voice too, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well I'm glad. I'm partial to it myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. You can keep doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you return with the bottle, you all get onto the boat. The older gentleman, as you all get on, introduces himself: "I'm Noah, this is my vessel. I'll take you where you need to go. Now, if I can ask where you're headed. Want to do a pass on the lake and back, or..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, where are we headed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are you still in bird mode?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. That ended. We hear that there's beautiful islands out in the middle of the Ustaloch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he pulls the rest of the rope in as you guys are on board, he stops. "Beautiful?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They haven't been on the water much. An island to the eyes of someone like him would appear--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've never seen a lake before this one so, first island. It's a very big moment for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes and gets his paddle out and begins making his way-- "Well there's only two islands out there. One's a piece of shite and the other's Crookedstone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's Crookedstone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No one goes over to Crookedstone."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one goes to Crookedstone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is our siren's call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say piece of shite? What's the name of the other one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it doesn't really have a name. It's too small."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so the big one is Crookedstone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Crookedstone, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I ask you where you're going?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that sounds like fun, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you guys aren't actually afraid of some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts the oar down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cork removal noise) (gulps) (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No aerator? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You monster! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've ruined it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair be it to me to judge. To Crookedstone, then." He picks up his oar and begins paddling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell me more about this witch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Probably died many years ago and no one goes around, seeing as it's cursed land. You'll see for yourself soon enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she have a wart on her nose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't really deal with witch folk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she wear a hat? Like a pointy one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd only expect as such."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Takes another swig as you guys begin to make your way towards the center of the Ustaloch--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I put an arm around Beau and have her come to the front of the boat so we can check out the waters as we're going, just for anything that might be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Both of you make a perception check, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep my eyes peeled as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to draw witches in my sketchbook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) God fucking shitballs cock!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually tagged along with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (growls and sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it went well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (high-pitched) It's great. It's a good roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm drinking tons of whiskey because I'm super scared to be on the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For future note, if everyone's going to make a perception check I may have a few folks, you know, to helm it, and other people aiding their roll with advantage. Just so we don't end up having a barrage of perception like, "They failed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crookedstone, here we come!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back! Sam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. There's Hail Marys and then there's that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to get you guys back one of these days real hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't poke the DM.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did that make it in? That was a nuke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was weirdly expecting more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you kidding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have next week another giveaway to look forward to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I choked on my spit as I wooed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swooed? Don't do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know how you did that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun has set as you guys approach the outer banks of the Crookedstone Island in the center of the Ustaloch. You can see the grove, a clustered central conglomerate of trees that all create this mound of brush. Now that you're up close against it, you can see the bit of moonlight that's starting to come over the horizon dancing across the upper part of the canopy. The trees, at most, are about 15 to ten feet tall. They're not incredibly huge, some even hovering around the five to ten foot range on the outskirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How tall was the lizard man? Devil toad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was about eight feet tall, hunched forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the bank, you can see already there's a lot of heavy rocks. This is not a soft, muddy embankment like the outskirts of the lake. This has a lot of jagged rock, and your ship-finding friend is carefully making his way through as close as he can before he comes to a stop, pushes off with an oar, and says, "All right, I think this is as close as I can get. What "are you doing here, if I might ask?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are going to have a picnic on the island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beach party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nighttime beach party!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nighttime beach party.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're carrying nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what is it, a deception? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry I asked."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The nighttime is the best time to go frog-digging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll tell you what."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kentucky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I get the sense the less I know, the better off I am. Go about your business, I'll be waiting "here. Don't do anything stupid. I'm not getting involved with anything. If there's some illegal "business here and I see something shifty, I'm back on the shore and you have to swim your way home."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. Would someone help me down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, I'll help you, Gramps. On either side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All you need to know is, there's three dudes and three ladies. You do the math.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't do the math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the bottle and takes a big, heavy swig, and sits down in the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll return.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys step off the boat into about ankle-deep water, traversing the broken bits of sharpened stone, making your way to the actual island of Crookedstone, you begin to slowly approach the outside of the treeline. What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Good and Evil Detection again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That seemed to work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a look around to see if I can find any footprints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use my (mumbles) again, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? Are you looking around for details?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm specifically looking for signs of Kylre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check, with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the name of the creature again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A nergaliid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heavens to Murgatroyd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's awful. Wait, that's cocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're under the light of the moons, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful. I can't even-- that's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. Because it's such a rocky shore, there aren't a lot of signs of landfall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moonlight, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moonlight, and a little bit of a dissipating orange-purple glow in the sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right, we've got some humans.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did a Travis burp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He blew it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I blew it that way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can taste it, can't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the plan, guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't find anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can start heading in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast it, I just will lose a spell slot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. I send Frumpkin into the sky. Look down, and see if now that I have him flying closer, maybe I can see better, or see something moving in this dim light, before it goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check on Frumpkin, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage because of the lack of light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Balls. That's a big seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're lowly humans. How did you deal with this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was awful. I let all of you go first everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the lack of detail, nothing really catches Frumpkin's eye from above.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's too dark. (flutters)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look and see if I see any big broken branches, or sign of something big moving through the forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception? Not investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you glancing about, or are you going to wade through the forest to look for things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No ranger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd like to move up to the treeline and see where the mud is, and see if I can see any sign of something big moving through the forest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or for a witch's hut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a big island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the same damn fucking roll. Piece of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is good, because the first roll should have stayed anyway. Works out well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Investigation? Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. It's hard to tell in the dark, unfortunately. Your human eyes prevent you from finding any details in the vicinity without a light source. The faint bit of moonlight gives you the general structure of the island, but beyond that, even looking close, you have a hard time making out details.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we fan out and move in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep a line. Within eye shot of each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like looking for drowned kids?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a line.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I can't see anything, I'm going to hand on your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guide you through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What is the order in which you guys are walking or fanning out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The exact order that our minis are, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it kind of works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put me next to Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put the humans in the middle, so that they can't be surprised.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put Fjord on the outside. There we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, not the exact order.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to do it like a V-formation, with Nott in the lead and the two humans just behind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott should be next to Caleb, because he can't see. So Nott should be right next to Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester and Nott switch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't spread out too far to where we're not in shouting distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So we spread.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you're in the-- We'll go with this.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going to die anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all carefully make your way into the treeline. The smell here is definitely that of low tide. You get that unearthing of sediment, and the occasional whiff of dead fish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we smell any brimstone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at the moment. You guys push further in. Are you being quiet about this?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then I would like you all to make a stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! There's my good roll!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's that magic we never had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something does catch the edge of your foot on the outskirts, Fjord, as you glance down. You see what looks to be two crustacean shells: small crabs that have been fished out of the nearby lake, and have been completely eaten. The inside has been cleared out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold for a second. These shells have been devoured.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I pass it down the line. The shells have been devoured!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bells have been deflowered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whales are in my power!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something about being deflowered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Toya love crabs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She ate what was put in front of her. We ate what was put in front of us. We're not picky people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue about 30 or so feet into the treeline, before you start finding, I wouldn't say a clearing, but the trees aren't as closely placed together. There is some semblance of an opening here and there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop burping! Yes you did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't burp!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You probably just breathed out hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, it was me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was you?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I meant Caleb's stink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have not burped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to keep an eye out for anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you're having a hard time to make out any sign. You guys make your way towards the center of this cluster of trees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk, Fjord and I will keep a lookout for any more crustacean empty shells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check. Well, one of you do, the other can aid if you want to, and that gives you advantage on the roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help me. I get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god you're helping me. Just perception? 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any more crab shells, but you do glance a bit ahead, and amongst the trees, you can see stonework. Stones stacked in a wall that is toppled over and fallen. A small ruin. Some sort of a structure, once a single-story structure that seems to have fallen inward and been destroyed. Partially overgrown, and what little moonlight comes through, you can make out the shape of it. There's corners still standing, but other than that, it looks like it's been toppled over and left to ruin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: TRAVIS. Yeah. With my darkvision, can I zero-in on what she's looking at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you get a little closer, you can, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I scoot up a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You creep up and you can see it's a ruined building. It looks like it was 30 feet on one side, 15 feet on the other. It's destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pretty spooky in this light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if we weren't here on business, I really want to see this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we sneak around the hut?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we surround the hut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no hut. It's a ruin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we sneak around the ruin?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're building a narrative here that Matt is not giving us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like The Secret. You're manifesting a witch fight here. "Where's the hut?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's approach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys approach. Who's keeping visual point on this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's got better eyes?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: I have darkvision.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm moving slow on purpose at the back of the group now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which means you are, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's helming this? I'll give one of you a perception roll to help on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it, Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're pointing at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're pointing at me? I don't want perception, you want Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, I should have given Beau disadvantage because of her human eyes. I let it slide because you were looking for crustaceans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do it! Because I like witch huts, I'll do it. What's yours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not used to you being a human.

lines.name: MARISHA
