lines.text: He basically saw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. It worked out fine for the narrative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go for it. I don't get advantage on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, okay. God. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too dark to see anything, even with your darkvision. It looks like a ruin. It could very well be that this island is abandoned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like, when we get up close to it, like it's caved in on top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like whatever roof was has fallen in, and all there are are some semblances of the wall still standing, and corners to the structure, but most of it is either crumbled in entirely--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can see the edges of it, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, give me a boost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Getting up on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You climb up onto-- there is no roof to it, per se. It's all fallen in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want me to put a witch in this? You want me to throw a witch in this? There can be a witch, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a full, two-story hut with a burning fireplace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll pull out the Baba Yaga, give me five seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got rules for this shit in the book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hear a dice fall, "And... six witches come out."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, going back to my first campaign. Roll for number of witches. As you vault up to the top edge of one of the stronger walls, you head up onto the side and glance to the back, right as a pair of red eyes (whoosh) right up at you, and this (growling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We know that sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to roll initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did not sneak that in, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody, or just her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which dice? I haven't rolled this dice yet. Maybe it will be kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at this well-constructed map.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit snacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Beau, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at the size of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, you're up in the air, bro!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And little Toya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabouts are you guys, currently?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would be the furthest back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord's right next to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Molly were closer to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord's right there, giving you the boost up. You and Molly were close to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Closer than Caleb. Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are next to each other, because you're holding there. Molly moved up to probably here. Around there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm all right with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The trees are awesome. Oh man! That fucking music.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and-- oh shit, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, they rolled really well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They? It's just one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Toya's there too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toya's just a dwarf girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to pull out some shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah she is, don't trust that bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20, anybody? Nott, since you got high-- You got higher than that last time. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. We have Molly up front at 18. Who's next after that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You and Frumpkin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the ease of this, we're going to run with Frumpkin on your initiative order because otherwise it's another initiative we have to worry about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So keep him with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right, so, Caleb. 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Nott. What did you get, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you can't see because you're looking through the sparrow, or because you're a human?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why we're holding hands?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not holding hands anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the combat round. Molly, you hear this growl, and you watch Beau begin to react and get the staff ready and you immediately know this is not good, but you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull out both my swords, and I'm going to drag them--

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: [imitating him] Borth your swords!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Irish, Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not doing my accent right now. So I'm going to pull out both the swords, and I'm going to drag them on the back of my neck, and before the blood even begins to pour, it goes straight into ice along the blades.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only apply one per round on a bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Action, bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're doing both right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Action and bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it's a bonus action; you can't convert an action to a bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't turn an action to a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could apply it once, and then you still have your action if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can mark down, you take down your temporary hit points or your max hit points to 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to move around and I'm going to try and get a little cover right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Toya. Ah, brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now Kylre's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, right away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, seeing you right there, the devil toad turns to little Toya to the side, who looks a bit dirtied at a glance, and goes, "They're trying to take you away. Come, sing for us! Stop them!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look down at Fjord and I go: let me down! Help me down!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The devil toad is going to straight leap, which would pass through your-- you get an attack of opportunity-- and land right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at the size of that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your attack, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't really do anything; it's just a whack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a hit with your staff, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just with my staff, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great. Seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. You smack it on the way, with this horrible wet thud to the back of its body, but it moves through with immense speed, especially with the density and the weight of this thing as it lands, the ground shakes in the area, the vicinity, and as it lands, it uses its action to Summon Devil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Summon Devil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it lands, it begins to mutter a language under its breath. Anybody here speak Infernal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear an incantation that essentially amounts to a faint, "Come, protect me, brothers," beneath its breath, and three bursts of flame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three!? Not three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As three imps apparate in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking imps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here and here. Roll their initiative. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) We're fucked. We're fucked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So excited right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's his action, and Toya's up next! Toya actually rolled initiative just below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She wants to be our friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toya is looking around, looking scared, looking at you motioning towards her. (sung note) Her haunting voice begins to spread from her and I need all of you to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17. Natural 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you shake your head and back away. You: your eyes move towards her, and there's an enchantment that pulls your attention. You have disadvantage on any attack rolls you make for the next turn. She, scared, sees you, and begins to walk back this way and hide behind the wall, but continues to sing, giving this aura in the vicinity. That ends Toya's turn. Beau, you're up, as well as Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your action? Where are you placing your--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she can appear anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see real fast. Still getting used to these new abilities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use your D&D Next to look at the information about that spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears anywhere within 30 feet of you in an unoccupied space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight. Okay, she's going to appear in the tree in front of me. Next to Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did you have two minis made for yourself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Matt did the second one! Isn't that cool!?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then as me, I'm going to run away. Can I run behind a tree and crouch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go around this one there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to crouch behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to vault off of the platform that I'm on, and I'm going to go for Toya. I'm going to take my bo staff. I'm going to try and take her where her throat is and grapple her down to the ground. Like to basically throat crush and get on top of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little larynx assault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Beau will have far less problems hurting children.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You make the landing, roll, and go towards her. You're going to use your action to grapple?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grapple her down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an athletics check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put her in a body bag, Johnny!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was so close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a 14. Yeah, I know, you can barely see that one. Athletics you said? 19. 18, sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The singing falters for a second, but she continues to still sing, and you see her eyes looking around desperately for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have a bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you have a bonus action, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I crush in a little bit further and get her to stop singing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crush that windpipe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a little!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically a grapple is an attack, so it's an attack action, so yeah. You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. Y'all thought Keyleth was a fuck-up. What am I doing, just a straight attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a straight attack. If you're just hitting, or pushing ahead with it, I'll say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? Does not hit, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got the strongest windpipe ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more that fact that as you're pressing in, she's adjusting her body and she's reaching up, grabbing, and trying to keep her voice emitting from her throat. You can't seem to get a beat to press. She looks genuinely really scared and freaking out at being put in this position.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to say: I felt bad for you before, but now you

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends Beau's turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question: is the humans' visibility shit right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's no light in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can't see what I'm doing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most any roll you'd be making would be at disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so four globules of light go (popping) out of my hands and one of them hovers--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, we have a light for this. Forgot about that! I should've put that on. Hints of moonlight.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: That's 30 feet there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do it. I'm going to look at the imp and I'm, in Infernal, I'm going to say, to just-- terrible: There's nothing but death for you here. I'm going to attack Vicious Mockery on him and show him the bottom card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a bard?! What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Variant tiefling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to learn some-- Yeah, that's a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a no with a seven, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out how this works but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, when Caleb went down those four balls of light disappeared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a lot, but that's four points of psychic damage and he has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was just my bonus action, I'm going to use my action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vicious Mockery is an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No that's a-- it is an action, you're right. That's what I've got right now. Just trying to get its attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your turn. It is now Kylre's turn who is-- (laughs) oh man, yeah. He was about to go right after Beau, but he's scared of you and cannot move closer towards you. He's going to take a swing at Nott. He's like (panicked muttering) and try to squash the small thing right there, with disadvantage. That is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16's your armor class? That hits. 11 points of piercing damage as the claw strikes out at you, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. We're not doing well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten is just what you needed to succeed. The poison from the claws of the toad does not set into your system.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't believe this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Who's down? You're down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's the only one who's down but we're all hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I've got a thing right in front of me so I can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kylre's going to-- out of sheer panic now from you-- try to flee. So he's going to leap and land over here. You do both get attacks of opportunity on the toad. Would not have fled except for that fear effect. He's like, "Fuck, I got to run."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I grab the sword with two hands, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. You added sneak attack to that, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do I get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he is next to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 points of damage, and does that trigger another psychic attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How does the effect on that work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says the next time you hit with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration your attack deals an extra 1d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. So that's 11 plus five, so 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Committed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bitch, isn't it? Concentration's a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so that being the case, that's going to end Kylre's turn. Lands, looks over at you hiding behind the tree--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing, Beau and Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can go first this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go first? Who am I next to? Who's Beau next to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here, next to Toya.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Fjord is in between... I'm too far away from everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I run-- I want to pick her up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half movement with her if you bring her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair. No, I'm sorry. I want to move this way towards Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Double move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I'll try and get behind-- I've got a 40-foot movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. So you can get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I have any type of bonus action or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I yell, Kylre! And I want to hold up the girl and be like, come get her! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kylre, between the trees and being frightened of Fjord, doesn't seem to notice you at the moment. He's currently focused on the fear effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast-- fuck-- Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Glad you didn't do Detect Evil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, that's good! Nine points of damage healed. Okay. Which is going to go away as soon as I turn and run away from the imp towards Fjord, around the trees so that the frog guy doesn't get an attack on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're still in his combat range, actually. He has a ten-foot range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay. Maybe he'll be distracted by fear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does have disadvantage on the attacks because of the fear effect, so that's helpful. Do you want to run through this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can't follow you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, that puts you there. Both the imp and Kylre get an--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both have disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The imp because...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, yeah. That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Part of the plan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn. We're in a tight spot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That puts you at a nine, which I'm pretty sure misses. As you rush past, you hear the (boom) of the ground behind you and bits of dirt and rock throw up, tapping the back of your head from the impact of Kylre's grasp hitting the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just running away saying: Shit, shit, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Caleb. I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's one success in that. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is an imp still in front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. There is an imp that just knocked Caleb to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to fuck me up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm like ten feet away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. 15 feet from him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 15 feet. I'll draw and shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull out your hand crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? That does not hit, unfortunately. It ducks out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I will--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have so few actions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really do. I will cover Caleb's body with mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run right past Jester as she's going, "Shit, shit!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 is as close as you can get right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is not in melee. Damn! Eldritch Blast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing that, you can take a step back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take one back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis wouldn't, but Fjord would know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits. Is it a natural 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 17. Plus six, 23. Sorry. That is eight plus four plus two. 12, 14, and the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't do additional psychic damage, it has to be a melee weapon to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage. All righty. Fjord, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! I run up. Stop. Realize how long its arms are. Flip the sword over. Look into the pommel, and fire it into his back, line him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls to its knees and then slowly the rest of its body tumbles away into ash and dust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is no body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole body doesn't burn away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a body!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wound where it impacted is burned up at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank god. Is that imp still there? Is the imp still active?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two imps are still active, yes. That ends your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That imp is going to go after Nott, who is currently protecting the body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to Blood Maledict. I'm going to Curse of the Eyeless on that imp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one, the one that is attacking Nott?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one that is attacking Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so disadvantage on that one. That puts it at 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As its eyes cloud over, it swings with its stinger and you feel it just barely hit the tip of your hood and pull it back. But no impact from the stinger. One will attack you, Fjord. That is an 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer seven points of piercing damage, and I need you to roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money! That's not big money!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is not big money. I'm pretty sure that is low, because that is a two. Yeah, that's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d6 of poison damage, that is 14 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm unconscious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh for fuck's sake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From an imp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That stinger is no joke, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't that be funny if we killed the thing and then died from the imps? That would be so funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends both imps' goes. Molly, you are up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running at the closest imp. Can I get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take two swings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake. Nope. That was a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You try and swing, the blind rage in your eyes, but the imp whose eyesight you had cursed, hearing you approaching, manages to just get out of your range. Sorry man, that sucks. All right, that brings us to Beau and Jester's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to turn and say: Oh, help me, Traveler! I'm going to cast Word of Radiance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's pronounced "verd."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which will hit both of the imps with 1d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Word of Radiance. Each creature of my choice I can see must succeed on a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw? Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five and 16. The one over Fjord succeeds, the one over Nott does not. What does it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 1d6 radiant. Six damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage to the one over Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the one that someone damaged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's the one he cursed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with Vicious Mockery. That's enough to do it. This bright, whitish-blue light begins to burn up its body. As it tries to fly away, you watch its body burn away like flash paper.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: That is cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you bonus action anybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stabilize someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's a feat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a bonus can I-- I don't even have a healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is one on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run over to-- oh shit, the imp is still over top of Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, that's the threat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make my illusion jump down and start charging at the imp over Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again, there is no way I can break through the grounds and get to this imp, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could dash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get there and draw attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many imps are left?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gave my healer's kit to her, so there's nothing I can do to try and bring the girl back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can soak up damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has got two more rounds regardless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She does. She's already saved one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually I need to make another. Okay, success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn, there's not a lot I can do. I guess I'll run up. Just there. Can I pick up a rock and throw a rock and be like: Get! Get on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, we'll call it an improvised weapon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not proficient. So go ahead and roll a straight attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four. 14. I guess that's a four. So ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear it clatter against a tree in the distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yah! Yah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn trash pandas, get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, make another death saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you doing, man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two successes. All righty. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the other imp-y thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what happens when you don't look!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should've looked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll one more attack roll for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six? You hear a (metallic sound) across your shield as a bolt from a hand crossbow almost hits you, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm blinded by tears! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is-- oh man, one imp is going to kill us all. One fucking imp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Nott, does that end your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I can't do anything. I can run over to the other thing, but I can't do anything, so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to stabilise Fjord, is what we've got to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And my boy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb? Caleb's doing okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have two successes. Not that you know that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that, but... I'm just staying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, I need you to make a death saving throw. It's been a long time since you've had to make one of these in the game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fail. All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that your first fail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. The imp-- I'm going to make a perception check for that imp. That's not good enough. The imp is going to go ahead and fly over and attempt to take a swing at your duplicity illusion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Does anything happen when the illusion is hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say! It just says for the duration you can cast spells as though you were in the illusion's space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have advantage on attack rolls against the creature if we're both within five feet of each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running right at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake! I've got to stop rolling that die. This is-- yeah, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of them fucked you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 does not hit. It's too quick. You swing twice more and it's doing figure-eights around your blades. It's frustrating the shit out of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poor Molly. His arms are getting so tired swinging both those blades.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so embarrassing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dice don't give a shit--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Toya--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so embarrassing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --succeeds on her third death saving throw and stabilizes. No, she's stabilised. A natural 20 is what we'd need to see for the one. All right, so that brings us to Beau and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to attack the imp?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll-- yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you get advantage because I'm engaged with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It doesn't work that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not a rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So seeing everyone dodge this thing, I'm just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you're flanking it, I'll allow advantage on the attack. Which is like, as long as you're on the complete opposite side of the foe--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is a convention around the imp right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can-- I'll say you can get advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone's like, "Hey, hey, hey!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh, look at it scoot! God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you can if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm just going to run up and be like, stupid! I'm going to try and stomp it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to try and knock it to the ground and stomp on it, is that what you're doing? Because it's flying in the air. All right, first strike. So attack with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like that video from Ireland. Catch it, daddy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage, right? That hits. 15, natural. With my two-handed staff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forget that! Eight, so 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the first attack crushes the imp and it hits the ground, the wings go limp and it's dead, but you still (yells) and stomp down, just crushing it more and more. And then its body eventually just burns away into ash. So all the threats have been neutralised and you now have two friends that are bleeding out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to run over to Fjord and cast Cure Wounds on him so he wakes up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come back to consciousness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With five hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try to stabilise Caleb using no--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, I need you to make a death save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Death save? Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. And I will do mouth-to-mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say for the purposes of this, you watch as Nott pulls the porcelain mask back and just gives Caleb the most terrifying mouth-to-mouth you've ever seen. Caleb, the darkness fades and you come to consciousness. The first things you notice are the cold temperature, the taste of iron in your mouth, and the vision of Nott pulling away from you like a terrifying Nosferatu.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus! Like Willem Dafoe as--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb goes (yelps), and I cast Dancing Lights into the goblin and light her up! Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Temporarily blinded.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the hell happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like 2am and the lights come on at the club.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, that's what she looked like? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I start dancing around in a circle with my illusion. We did it, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as two Jesters start doing a little skip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately run to Toya.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, I'm going to run to Toya and pick her up. I've got her. I've got her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you-- I've got her. I could hold her, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you were the last face she saw? I should probably be the first. Thank you. You did the right thing. You don't need to be the first thing she sees. She'll just start screaming all over again. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything of the toad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. I want to go over and start searching his body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it burned away, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The inside is partially burned out to embers in the blast, but there's still probably 60 percent of the body remaining.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, am I at one hit point at this moment? It was zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be at one hit point when you come to consciousness. I'm giving you that because of the natural 20. Any other roll, you would just be stabilised.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: True love's kiss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation or perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is investigation, because you're poring through the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. You find a small pouch of flesh, like a little hiding pouch that you kind of reach in a little bit and it has kind of a mucus-y liquid on the inside. As you reach in, your fingers find what appear to be a few small stones you can feel at the tip of your fingers. Do you pull them out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like rings, necklaces. There's actually a few stolen pieces of jewelry that are in the pouch as well as a few coin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? This is awesome. Here, Fjord, I found a cloister of seamen for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it? What did you give me? What is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a bag of stuff that I think you will like. I already removed all the fancy stuff from it though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's just gooey flesh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's definitely a cloister. It's a nu-gget.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's foul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But other than that, it is devoid of any other items or objects and it looks like that was its running fund.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! I put all of the jewels on my fingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still slick but easy to put on because they're lubricated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, look at me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are very nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't these pretty rocks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are very pretty, yes. Where did you find them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the bag? Can I have one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but first, can I use a ritual spell? Does that work against-- Yeah. I can do ritual spells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do ritual spells and it won't take a spell slot, just takes ten minutes more of casting time to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I Detect Magic on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. So you take a little bit of time concentrating on it. At the end of the spell, you send out your extended consciousness, but they do not resonate anything magical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, they're just plain rings, but they're very pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you going to do with the girl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Get her back home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's home for a traveling circus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if she's evil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. We're going to have a talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should bring her to the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Authorities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that she can defend us. So that she can tell everyone that the fiend was bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if she feels that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if she feels that way either, but although-- it's going to take some time, I think. And also, we're going to need the body, and honestly, only one of us was here. For those at home, I'm pointing at Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, why was he the only one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because the rest of us are under arrest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's very true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure you will be well-rewarded and compensated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are a very powerful wizard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know, ain't nothing. (coughs) (high-pitched) Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's how I feel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my healing kit and help heal him? Does that work, or does it just bring somebody back to consciousness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just helps stabilise. There's a feat you can take that makes it do more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh really? Okay, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any anything left in you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can heal you in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or we could just sit here for a bit and I could catch my breath, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can rest for 30 minutes or an hour or so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys sit here in the quiet, you can hear the crickets now; the rest of the sound of the forest has fallen away and the din of the battle has vanished. The moonlight gets a bit brighter as the moon climbs higher in the sky. And you all kind of look around at each other. Through this haphazard series of events you've come to assemble a skillset that seems to overlap pretty well. And hopefully it's enough to clear your name. But we'll find that out next week. So we're going to end the episode. We'll be back to continue that thread next Thursday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I want to, like, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but it's 10:45!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would just like to say that as we're resting there, I'm closing my eyes and keeping a hand down close to Nott with my rings on my fingers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to take one off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleight of hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight-- 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't even think you have high enough perception at all. You have a very nice--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was all the mucus on the ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. And we'll leave it at that. All right, thank you guys so much for watching. I'm excited to continue this next week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, I got the full wizard experience tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. Well done, that's your first boss fight of the campaign!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so unpleasant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Fjord!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of you went down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this mean we level up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, because we are doing milestone leveling with this campaign--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means there's no experience points, but at the end of each major story beat, like a big moment that I see fit, then everyone will level up together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So do you see fit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will see fit when this arc concludes, so end of next episode, probably, everyone's going to hit level three. So start thinking about-- for those of you who have to choose a path, think about what you want to do if you haven't already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm going to multiclass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Master of none.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not even passable. (laughs) All right, thank you guys so much for watching. Thank you again, D&D Beyond, for being our awesome partner and sponsor for the leg of this campaign. Hope you all have a wonderful weekend, and is it Thursday yet? Have a good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We lived!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We lived! Episode three! [music]
